title: 30: Game 1s In The Books
description: We're in The Lab to look back on the opening weekend of the NBA playoffs. We discuss Dipo and the Pacers, wonders what the Blazers can do to stop AD, and more.
itunes:title: 30: Game 1s In The Books
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
